section.string: Deleting your old favorites failed, please try again.
One of the forums you specified doesn't exist and wasn't added to favorites.
A default list of favorites will be used if yours is empty.
Enter a forum name to begin a new search...

Select forums you want to see on top of home page. To add a new forum, enter the first letter of its name below and select it in dropdown menu. You can also sort forums you already selected using drag and drop, ou delete the ones you don't want anymore.
